rationale: Test suite shows critical failures in new Loop 3 implementations. While coordinator-helper-registration tests PASS (7/7), both MessageBroker routing tests and real message bus integration tests have significant failures that indicate incomplete implementation.

critical_failures: Message routing to available helpers - reply.helpers undefined
Route to specific agent ID - helpers not found
TaskScheduler.graph.addNode is not a function (2 occurrences)
Priority-based message delivery - wrong order (critical vs low)
Mixed priority messages - avgHighIndex not less than avgLowIndex
Timeout on no reply - promise resolved instead of rejected

blockers: HelpRequestHandler MessageBroker integration incomplete - 9/13 tests failing
Real MessageBus integration has TaskScheduler graph initialization bug
Request/reply pattern not working - promises not resolving correctly
Message priority ordering broken - critical messages not prioritized
Metrics tracking not functional - all counters returning 0

required_actions.action: Fix MessageBroker request/reply integration - reply objects undefined
Fix graph.addNode initialization - method not found error
Implement metrics tracking for routing operations
Fix timeout handling - promises should reject on timeout

recommendation: RELAUNCH Loop 3 with targeted agents to fix critical MessageBroker and TaskScheduler integration issues before proceeding to consensus validation.
